sentences.en: Having a mentor is the crux to the vacationing process.
sentences.cn: 有个导师是找到理想工作的关键.

sentences.en: He fed on the great ideas of his mentor.
sentences.cn: 他以他导师的伟大思想为支撑。

sentences.en: He has really a bit of a mentor for me.
sentences.cn: 他真的有点象我的导师.

sentences.en: He was a great mentor , friend, scholar and role model.
sentences.cn: 他是位良师 、 益友 、 学者和他人的榜样.

sentences.en: He was now playing the role of disinterested host and avuncular mentor.
sentences.cn: 他现在正扮演着慷慨的主人和伯父似的指导人的角色.

sentences.en: He was, and is a great mentor asas a great leader.
sentences.cn: 他既是一位伟大的领导者, 也是一位伟大的导师,过去是,现在也是.

sentences.en: Leon Sullivan was my mentor and my friend.
sentences.cn: 利昂·沙利文既是我的导师，也是我的朋友。

sentences.en: Mentor Corp. and Allergan Inc. make the two approved products.
sentences.cn: 这两种被批准的产品是由Mentor公司和Allergan有限公司生产的.

sentences.en: My mentor accepted my invitation to dinner with good grace.
sentences.cn: 我的导师愉快地接受了我请他吃饭的邀请.

sentences.en: Participants are assigned a mentor from the Tesco board.
sentences.cn: 特易购董事会为受训者指派导师.

sentences.en: Recruit, guide and mentor junior members the CAD team.
sentences.cn: 招聘, 指导,培训CAD团队的初级成员.

sentences.en: Some 14,000 professionals mentor kids and help them in robotics competitions.
sentences.cn: 约14,000位专业顾问辅导年轻人,并在机器人竞赛中给予协助.

sentences.en: The key to mastering any new job is finding the right mentor.
sentences.cn: 对新工作尽快上手的窍门,就是找对职业导师.

sentences.en: The men stepped forward to kiss the hand of their mentor.
sentences.cn: 这些男子走上前去轻吻他们导师的手。

sentences.en: To me you have such a mentor and am happy and happy.
sentences.cn: 我以有你这样的良师益友而深感幸福和快乐.

sentences.en: You were, you are, and you remain to be my beloved mentor.
sentences.cn: 你过去是, 现在是, 将来仍然是我敬爱的导师.

trans.tran_en: an experienced person who advises and helps a less experienced person
